name: Asteroid Buds 40th Mod
description:
So the basic story of Asteroid Buddies is the same as the original. Float. Shoot. Destroy. Repeat. Except for in this version, there are “buddies” floating around

This is a mod of the excellent asteroid buddies by Foppygames 2006. Uploaded with permission - changes include new sounds, music, graphics, difficulty and enemies behaviour to create a more challenging buddy experience.
